description: Development Quiz (DevQuiz) is a Next.js quiz game where players select topics and answer OpenAI-generated questions. The app tracks their history and stats using PostgreSQL and Prisma ORM.

Otzar.ai is a fully responsive landing page crafted with React and powered by an Express backend that efficiently processes whitelist requests. It offers a seamless and dynamic user experience tailored for modern web standards.

Yuletide Token is presented through a fully responsive landing page built with React and styled-components. It effectively showcases the tokenâ€™s features with a modern design, engaging animations, and a smooth interactive experience.

RunBro is designed to encourage a healthier lifestyle through daily physical activities, particularly running. By offering rewards for achieving personal fitness goals, it motivates users to stay active. My role in the project was developing the frontend using Next.js.
This project showcases a fully functional blockchain based on the Proof-of-Work consensus mechanism, developed using Go. It includes a user interface for wallets and handles server interactions.
WeaveSwap combines a decentralized exchange and a lending protocol, created for the BNB Hackathon. I was responsible for designing and deploying all smart contracts powering the platform.
A decentralized token bridge that facilitates secure cross-chain token transfers. Built with Solidity and Hardhat, it employs secure signing methods to ensure transactional integrity.
A robust backend for an e-commerce platform built with Express.js and PostgreSQL. It manages user accounts, authentication (via Passport and cookies), orders, and shopping cart functionalities.

A fully-featured liquidity pool developed with Solidity, JavaScript, and Hardhat. It supports token swaps, liquidity provision, and yield farming, offering DeFi users a comprehensive trading solution.

An ERC-1155-based smart contract for creating multiple game items like avatars, power-ups, and in-game currencies. It uses Chainlink VRF for generating random outcomes when interacting with item packs.

A decentralized charity funding DAO built with OpenZeppelin contracts. This project streamlines charity funding by minimizing intermediary costs and making the process fast, transparent, and reliable.
A full implementation of the EIP712 standard, designed for secure wallet signatures. This was my contribution to the wallet-signature project, built using the Foundry framework.

A fully automated trading bot written in Python, utilizing the Double Supertrend strategy alongside Heikin Ashi candles for enhanced accuracy. The bot trades on Binance, leveraging API integrations for real-time market data.
